ygData.subject: AW: [eqbards] New Bard Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: very nice songs, lets see how they perform. cap exceeding haste songs and improved resist and manasong will add greatly to the bards value. amplification will
ygData.messageBody:
very nice songs, lets see how they perform. cap exceeding haste songs and
improved resist and manasong will add greatly to the bards value.
amplification will also be interesting to see how it works, especially with
VoV and the psalm songs.

tobi

-----Urspr├╝ngliche Nachricht-----
Von: Windleaf Mistsong [mailto:windleaf@...]
Gesendet am: Dienstag, 4. Dezember 2001 06:44
An: eqbards@yahoogroups.com; eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Betreff: Re: [eqbards] New Bard Songs

Don't you hate when the formatting gets screwed up. Here's the list again
in plain text:

*Magical Monologue - Self Only Weapon Enhancement, level 9.
*Song of Sustenance - Group Hunger and Thirst Replenishment, level 15.
*Amplification - Increase Effectiveness of Singign Based Songs, level 30.
*Katta's Song of Sword Dancing - Group Dex Buff with Dex Debuff Proc,
level 39.
*Selo's Accelerating Chorus - Group Long Duration Run Song, level 49.
*Battlecry of the Vah Shir - Group Haste Song (Exceeds Cap), level 52.
*Elemental Chorus - Area Effect Fire, Cold, Magic Resistance Song, level
54.
*Purifying Chorus - Area Effect Poison, Disease, Magic Resistance Song,
level 56.
*Chorus of Replenishment - Area Effect Mana, Health and Stamina
Regeneration, level 58.
*Warsong of the Vah Shir - Group Haste Song (Exceeds Cap), level 60



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
